articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Ground Test of Jet of High-power Solid-fuel Rocket Engine and Its Cascade Separation
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Ground Test of Jet of High-power Solid-fuel Rocket Engine and Its Cascade Separation
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, personally came out to the testing site and guided the ground  test of jet of high-power solid-fuel rocket engine and its cascade separation.
					 The test was aimed to examine the structural safety of the rocket engine newly designed and manufactured by the Korean style and its thrust and estimate the working specifications of heat separation system and other system.
					
					 Before the test, he touched the engine smoothly and said with confidence that the test would prove successful as it was manufactured by defence scientists and technicians of the DPRK, a product of self-reliance and self-development.
					
					 He gave an instruction to start the test.
					
					 The engine spewed out huge flames with deafening boom.
					
					 The results of the test proved that the values of estimation conformed to those of measurement to an amazing extent and they are in full line with all scientific and technological indexes.
					
					 He expressed great pleasure and satisfaction, clapping his hands and congratulating them on their success.
					
					 He noted with great pleasure that the successful test provided a firm guarantee for attaining the high goals of national defence science and technology without fail this year when the Seventh Congress of the WPK would be held and helped boost the power of ballistic rockets capable of mercilessly striking hostile forces.
					
					 The successful test of the jet and cascade separation of the above-said rocket engine which is of historical and strategic importance by dint of self-reliance and self-development makes it possible to remarkably bolster the military capability of the invincible revolutionary Paektusan army, he noted, stressing that the feats the national defence scientists and technicians of the DPRK performed by working hard to increase the national defence capability would always go down in the history of the country. He had a photo session with them.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the scientists and technicians in the field of national defence science would achieve successes one after another to instill conviction and optimism into the service personnel and people of the DPRK and, at the same time, strike great horror and terror into the hearts of the enemies, bearing in mind the heavy yet honorable duties they have assumed before the times, the revolution, the country and its people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to February 11 Plant under Ryongsong Machine Complex
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to February 11 Plant under Ryongsong Machine Complex
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the February 11 Plant under the Ryongsong Machine Complex.
					 He went round the room for the education in the revolutionary history.
					
					 He said that the plant splendidly arranged the room for the education in the revolutionary history which houses with due respect photos of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the principle of visual effect and displayed well historic data and relics.
					
					 Noting that the history of the plant represents the one of the leadership of the President and Kim Jong Il, he stressed the need for its workers to boost the production of modern heavy machines and equipment urgently required by various fields of the national economy through the meticulous organization of the education in their leadership exploits and thus thoroughly implement their behests. 
					
					 He acquainted himself with the progress made in the development of new type machine products instructed by him during his field guidance to the plant last year.
					
					 Greatly pleased to see ultra-modern machine products standing in rows, he said that it was spectacular scenery. He highly praised the plant, noting it deserves the title of hero as it unconditionally carried out any task set forth by the WPK.
					
					 He looked round the sheet metal processing shop, the steel casting shop, assembling shop and other places of the plant to learn in detail about its production.
					
					 Saying that the plant has a very important role to perform in developing the machine-building industry and building a thriving nation, he set forth tasks to be fulfilled by the plant in the production and the management activities.
					
					 He underlined the need to update the plant to meet the requirements of the age of knowledge-based economy and a highly civilized socialist nation in order to sharply increase its production capacity and further improve the quality of products and gave precious instructions for carrying out those tasks.
					
					 He underscored the need to successfully build a sci-tech dissemination center and manage it effectively to help the officials and employees of the plant acquire modern science and technology as increase in production and the improvement of quality of products are guaranteed by science and technology. He also called for directing great efforts to training them as intellectuals by putting them under study-while-working educational system. 
					
					 He said that the party itself would take charge of building the sci-tech dissemination center and cultural center of the plant and complete the projects within this year.
					
					 He expressed great expectation and belief that the workers of the plant would give face-lifting to the plant to meet the requirements of the age of knowledge-based economy and a highly civilized socialist nation and bring about fresh upsurge in the development and production of modern machines.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hong Yong Chil, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Congratulations to Beninese President-Elect
articles.content:
Congratulations to Beninese President-Elect
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Patrice Talon on his election as Beninese president.
					 The message expressed belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would as ever grow stronger, wishing the president-elect big success in his work for the country's progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Spokesman for Korean Jurists Committee Slams Hostile Forces' Harsh Sanctions against DPRK
articles.content:
Spokesman for Korean Jurists Committee Slams Hostile Forces' Harsh Sanctions against DPRK
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korean Jurists Committee issued a statement on Thursday hitting out at the U.S. and its followers for slapping unilateral sanctions against the DPRK in the wake of the forcible adoption of the UNSC's "resolution on sanctions" No. 2270 against the latter by abusing its name.
					 The statement said that the DPRK's H-bomb test with which the hostile forces took issue is a self-defensive measure for defending the country's sovereignty and national right to existence from the U.S. aggressive hostile policy toward the former and daily-increasing nuclear threat to it.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The above-said measure can never be a target of the UNSC's "resolution on sanctions" in any case in view of international law.
					
					 The issue of a sovereign state's right to self-defense is publicly recognized as just in the light of international law as it is stipulated in the "Convention on States Responsibility" and on the principle of such international law, the UN has adopted the Resolution, "Declaration on the Inadmissibility of Intervention in the Domestic Affairs of States and the Protection of Their Independence and Sovereignty" as a resolution since the 20th UN General Assembly in 1965.
					
					 The DPRK's bolstering up of its nuclear deterrent can never be bound to anything as it declared its withdrawal from the NPT in March, 1993 to cope with the dangerous situation created by the U.S. threat of a nuclear war and it took effect in January, 2003.
					
					 The satellite launch of the DPRK, too, can never be a problem as it is an legitimate exercise of the right to explore space granted by international law.
					
					 The U.S. pressed the UNSC into adopting the "resolution on sanctions," finding fault with a sovereign state's right to self-defense and legitimate right. This is a blatant violation of the DPRK's sovereignty, a serious threat to world peace and security and the height of the brigandish arbitrary practice.
					
					 Not content with fabricating the illegal "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK in the UN arena, the U.S. is wooing its followers to put mean independent sanctions including sanctions against enterprises of the third country having business with the DPRK, openly talking about filling the gap.
					
					 The unilateral sanctions being imposed by the U.S. to stifle the DPRK are an illegal and unethical action to bring down the social system of a sovereign state and encroach on its right to development and existence.
					
					 As it has become clear that the hostile forces' moves to impose harsh sanctions on the DPRK to stifle it are aimed to infringe upon its right to existence and bring down its "social system," its toughest countermeasures are entirely just in the light of not only international law but also the right to self-defence.
					
					 The harsher sanctions to be slapped by the U.S. and its followers against the DPRK would only make its self-development capability stronger and precipitate their miserable end.

articles.title: Pakistani Embassy Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Pakistani Embassy Hosts Reception 
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The Pakistani embassy here hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on March 23 on the occasion of the Day of Pakistan.
					 Present there on invitation were DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong, Pak Kun Gwang and other officials concerned, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies and staff members of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Syed Sajjad Haider, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Pakistani embassy, said in his speech that the two countries have shared the same view on many regional and international issues, maintaining the friendly relationship.
					
					 He hoped that the Korean people would bring about the bright future under the guidance of supreme leader Marshal Kim Jong Un, adding that the Pakistani people are rejoiced over the successes made by the DPRK.
					
					 Ri Su Yong referred to the successes made by Pakistan in the work for accomplishing the independent development and prosperity since its independence, congratulating the Pakistani people on their national holiday.
					
					 The DPRK will make every effort to value and further develop the traditional friendly relations between the peoples of the two countries established in the joint struggle for independence, he added.

articles.title: GFUALK Marks Its 70th Founding Anniversary
articles.content:
GFUALK Marks Its 70th Founding Anniversary
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The General Federation of the Unions of Art and Literature of Korea (GFUALK) marked its 70th founding anniversary.
					 The federation founded on March 25, Juche 35 (1946) has registered successes in fully preparing officials, creators and artistes as the revolutionaries boundlessly loyal to the party and the leader and encouraging them to implement the original policy of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on literature and arts over the past seven decades.
					
					 A meeting for marking the anniversary took place at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Thursday.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, Pak Chun Nam, minister of Culture, officials, creators, artistes, teachers and researchers in the field of literature and art.
					
					 Conveyed there was a congratulatory message of the Central Committee of the WPK to the organizations, officials and members of the federation.

articles.title: NPCK's 67th Birthday Observed
articles.content:
NPCK's 67th Birthday Observed
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The National Peace Committee of Korea (NPCK) held an annual general meeting at the Chollima Hall of Culture on Thursday on its 67th founding anniversary.
					 Present at the meeting were senior officials, members of the standing committee, officials and members of the secretariat of the NPCK.
					
					 Officials of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with the World People, the Korean Committee for Afro-Asian Solidarity, the Democratic Lawyers Association of Korea and other Korean public organizations were also on hand as observers.
					
					 A reporter reviewed the committee's successes and experiences in 2015.
					
					 Informing the participants of the regional and international political situation around the Korean peninsula in 2015, the reporter noted that the struggle to achieve the national reunification and peace has encountered hard difficulties due to the hostile policy pursued by the U.S. and its followers toward the DPRK.
					
					 The reporter underlined the need for the committee to launch bold peace activities conducive to achieving peace and reunification of the country in 2016 in compliance with its mission and goals now that the danger of a nuclear war is increasing on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Speakers referred to the issues to tighten the ties with the world progressive figures, international democratic bodies, peace-loving and solidarity bodies and arouse them to the struggle for peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in northeast Asia and the rest of the world and co-prosperity of humankind.
					
					 After the meeting the participants looked round the photos introducing the activities of the committee in 2015.

articles.title: World Tuberculosis Day Observed
articles.content:
World Tuberculosis Day Observed
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- An event took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday on the occasion of the World Tuberculosis Day.
					 It was attended by officials in the field of public health and those concerned and representatives of the WHO and UNICEF here, diplomatic envoys and staff members of missions of international bodies here. 
					
					 Speakers at the event called on all people to make positive efforts to settle the issue of tuberculosis in response to the theme "Let's join hands to stamp out tuberculosis!" adopted by the WHO this year.
					
					 They underscored the need to raise the social concern for the campaign to combat tuberculosis and increase aid to thoroughly eradicate it.
					
					 The participants looked round the photos on display and watched a performance given by a hygienic information team of the Sosong District People's Hospital.
					
					 On the same day intensive hygienic information services were given in Pyongyang and every province.

articles.title: Spring Tree Planting Ceremony Held by Young RC Volunteers
articles.content:
Spring Tree Planting Ceremony Held by Young RC Volunteers
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- A spring tree planting ceremony of the young Red Cross volunteers took place in Sambong-ri, Phyongwon County, South Phyongan Province on Thursday on the spring period of the general mobilization for land administration.
					 Present at the ceremony were officials of the DPRK Red Cross Society, young RC volunteers, volunteers, officials concerned, the delegations of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies and the International Committee of the Red Cross who are working in the DPRK and foreign diplomatic envoys and staff members of their embassies here.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The participants planted trees.
					
					 The spring tree planting continues throughout the country till April.

articles.title: DPRK Citizens Determined to Punish S. Korean Provokers
articles.content:
DPRK Citizens Determined to Punish S. Korean Provokers
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet military warmongers on March 21 staged a "precision strike drill" aimed to destroy the office of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 Such provocation triggers off the towering hatred and resentment from among the DPRK people.
					
					 Rim Jong Sik, director of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry, told KCNA:
					
					 We can no longer remain an onlooker to the undisguised and dangerous military moves of the U.S. imperialists and the Park Geun Hye puppet group.
					
					 It is a motto of our army and people's life and struggle to devotedly defend the leadership of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The enemies' heinous military provocations have gone beyond the tolerance limit. A rabid dog should be beaten to death at once.
					
					 The workers in the metal industry are filled with the firm resolution to mercilessly punish the hordes of rabid dogs running wild to get the sun eclipsed.
					
					 We will bring about an unprecedented upsurge in steel production, waiting for the order of an all-people action to annihilate the enemy.
					
					 Kang Yong Jin, vice-director of the C.C., Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, said:
					
					 Timed to coincide with the "precision strike drill", Park Geun Hye cried out for undauntedly fighting against the DPRK. This is nothing but the fussing of a living dead. 
					
					 Together with the strong revolutionary Paektusan army, we young people will make the reckless provokers bitterly experience the disastrous consequences, once an order is given.

articles.title: Officials, Members of Agricultural Workers Union Tour Madusan Revolutionary Battle Site
articles.content:
Officials, Members of Agricultural Workers Union Tour Madusan Revolutionary Battle Site
Anju, March 24 (KCNA) -- Officials and members of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea toured the Madusan Revolutionary Battle Site on Thursday.
					 The battle site played the role of a regional leadership base and a vantage point for military operations in the western area of Korea as a secret guerilla base in Anju area during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.    It is associated with the exploits President Kim Il Sung performed by accomplishing the historic cause of national liberation and the indomitable fighting spirit of the Korean people who ushered in the new era of the national liberation struggle in colonies.
					
					 There are in the site such slogans written on barked trees as "Don't abandon revolutionary faith though one may die", a spring and others used by service personnel of small units of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army.

articles.title: Wangjaesan Art Troupe Gives Premiere in Kanggye
articles.content:
Wangjaesan Art Troupe Gives Premiere in Kanggye
 Kanggye, March 24 (KCNA) -- The Wangjaesan Art Troupe making performance tour in Jagang Province gave its premiere in Kanggye on Thursday at a time when 70-day campaign of the loyalty is being underway.
					 Among the audience were innovators and other working people of various circles and officials in the province.
					
					 The performance began with the playing of song "We Will Go to Mt. Paektu". Put on the stage were colorful numbers such as female chorus "Our Comrade Kim Jong Un" and female duet "His Humanity." 
					
					 The performers impressively represented the loyalty of the Korean people to become honorable victors by making the greatest successes and working the biggest labor merits in the on-going general charge toward the Seventh Party Congress.
					
					 Light music "Higher and Faster" and other numbers greatly pleased the audience.
					
					 The numbers including dance "Just Give Us Your Order" drew loud applauses from the audience, revving up the atmosphere.
					
					 The performance goes on.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Work Observed
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- A seminar in the field of sports was held at the Weightlifting Gymnasium in Chongchun Street on Thursday to observe the first anniversary of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Usher in a New Golden Age of Building a Sports Power in the Revolutionary Spirit of Paektu." 
					 The seminar heard papers explaining and proving the validity and scientific accuracy of the idea and theories enunciated by Kim Jong Un in his work.
					
					 The speakers said that his work serves as guidelines setting forth a new strategy to bring about a revolutionary turn in physical culture and sports as required by the building of a thriving nation and indicating the way of carrying it out.
					
					 They noted his work helps maximize the speed of advance for building a sports power by bringing the nation's sports technique to the world level as soon as possible.
					
					 The idea of encouraging all people to like sports and getting sporting fervor prevail throughout the country by popularizing them and making them part of their daily life has displayed its great vitality, they said.
					
					 Reality proves that in order to bring the nation's sports technique to the world's level as early as possible it is necessary to regard the process for putting sports on a scientific basis as a great propellant for sports development, they added.
					
					 They called for decisively strengthening the guidance over sports by enhancing the functions and roles of the sports guiding bodies in every way.
					
					 Present at the seminar were officials concerned and officials, coaches, teachers, researchers and media persons in the field of sports.

articles.title: DPRK Rich in Spring Water Resources
articles.content:
DPRK Rich in Spring Water Resources
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea is abundant in resources of spring water good for human health.
					 According to the recent survey, the country has more than 400 mountain streams, 260 of which are equivalent in taste and health index to springs around the world's areas of macrobians.
					
					 Those springs have been verified to be efficacious for digestive, endocrine and central nervous systems. They are also good for urination, hematosis and anti-inflammation function.
					
					 As well known to the world, in the country there are many and rich fountains, including Sindok mineral water and spas. In the 1970s and 1980s foreign experts stressed at international meetings that the DPRK is a zone for naturopathy with rich spas, mineral waters and springs.
					
					 Recently, a lot of springs were found around Ullim Falls and Mt. Chilbo through an intensive survey conducted under the government's decision for the improvement of people's health.

articles.title: Kansong Junior Secondary School
articles.content:
Kansong Junior Secondary School
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The Kansong Junior Secondary School in Phyongchon District, Pyongyang, is well-known for producing many mathematical talents.
					 Diverse forms of heuristics at the school helps all lessons convert into educational environment conducive to promoting the mathematical understanding of pupils.
					
					 Its graduates have been appreciated for their high mathematical ability at different educational institutions, including colleges and universities.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Dashing to Party Congress of Victory and Glory
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Dashing to Party Congress of Victory and Glory
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday editorially calls upon all the fields and units to dash at top speed in order to achieve the goals ahead of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea and proudly enter the venue of the grand festival in May.
					 Now is the just time for all the party members, service personnel and people to rush at top speed and with full energy with our party's indomitable and offensive revolutionary idea as an invincible banner, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 Our party's offensive idea is the daring idea of making charges to tide over any ordeals and hardships and the idea of continuous revolution advancing for higher goal, not content with a single victory and success. Herein lies the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu, which provides the lifeline of the ever-victorious revolution, and the immutable truth for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche. The unlimited vitality of our party's offensive revolutionary idea is the powerful ideological and moral weapon helping dash straight along the orbit of the Juche revolution, Songun revolution without the slightest hesitation, vacillation, compromise, concession, stagnation and stepping.
					
					 When all the people regard our party's offensive revolutionary idea as their faith and thoroughly implement it, the advance speed of the country will be up rapidly and everyone will exalt the honor of victors in the 70-day campaign of loyalty now underway.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Japan's Moves to Deny Hideous Crimes against Humanity
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Japan's Moves to Deny Hideous Crimes against Humanity
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The UN Committee on the Elimination of Discrimination against Women recently revealed that an "agreement" on the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army between Japan and south Korea adopted in December last year was not for the sake of the victims and strongly urged the Japanese reactionaries to stop of the issuing of statements and remarks and acts aimed to evade Japan's responsibility for the past crimes.
					 Minju Joson Thursday in a commentary dismisses this as the due warning and severe rebuke of the international community against Japan which is working hard to evade the blame for the hideous crimes against humanity.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army was not an incidental occurrence by individual soldiers but the most brutal hideous crimes committed against humanity in an organized way with the active involvement of Japan, the evil empire. 
					
					 No such country in the world's war history committed rape in systematic, organized and collective way as Japan which established the sexual slavery system and mobilized military and government power.
					
					 The above-said committee recently sent a warning message to Japan over its attitude to the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army which is reflective of such a trend of the international community.
					
					 The crime-woven history can never be erased nor covered up.
					
					 No future is for those who deny the history and make a mockery of human conscience.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should lend an ear to the voices of the international community and opt to make a sincere apology and reparation, not getting hell-bent on denying the hideous crimes against humanity.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses Japan of Anti-DPRK Reckless Moves
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses Japan of Anti-DPRK Reckless Moves
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- These days the Japanese political circle is stirring up the public opinion against the DPRK.
					 Japanese Foreign Minister Kishida talked nonsense that it was not acceptable that north Korea made provocative remarks and acts in response to the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises and that it is necessary to intensify international pressure.
					
					 Defence Minister Nakatani spouted out reckless remarks that possibility of additional "provocation" from north Korea can not be ruled out and that efforts should be focused on the preparation to cope up with all possibilities.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday comments on this:
					
					 Lurking behind Japan's shameless moves to stir up the public opinion that reverses black and white is its cunning intention to catch fish in troubled waters by cooperating with the U.S. master in its hostile moves against the DPRK.
					
					 Looking back on history, Japan has drawn water to its mill with the backing of a big country.
					
					 Japan has kept the U.S. troops which were left with no justifications for presence as the remains of Cold War era and paid upkeep for their presence in Japan with the tax collected from its citizens. This humiliating policy servile to the U.S. is designed to make Japan become a military giant and realize an ambition for reinvasion with the help of the U.S.
					
					 The end of good begins evil. The Japanese authorities should remember that their bad habit will bring an irretrievable calamity to them and their citizens.
					
					 The DPRK has already solemnly made clear its stand to cope with the anti-DPRK frenzy of the enemies.
					
					 The Japanese authorities will be held accountable for the catastrophic consequence to be entailed by their reckless moves.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Declares General Strike
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Declares General Strike
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The MBC Headquarters of the south Korean Press Trade Union declared a general strike in protest against the moves of the broadcasting service side to stamp out the trade union.
					 The organization on February 1 demanded the authorities solve an issue as regards the fact that the broadcasting service side has not concluded a collective contract with the trade union for several years but persisted in the above-said moves.
					
					 It stressed that the members of the trade union would unite to hold in check the moves of the management including the manager of the MBC and defend the trade union.

articles.title: 15 Years in Jail Demanded for S. Korean Attacker against U.S. Ambassador
articles.content:
15 Years in Jail Demanded for S. Korean Attacker against U.S. Ambassador 
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean fascist prosecution on Tuesday demanded 15 years in jail for Kim Ki Jong, attacker against the U.S. ambassador to south Korea.
					 As asserted by south Korean people of all social standings, Kim Ki Jong's punishment of the U.S. ambassador to south Korea on March 5 last year was an expression of resistance against the U.S. which threatened peace and security on the Korean peninsula and blocked national reunification through joint military exercises against the north.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Park Geun Hye group of traitors brought charges against Kim's righteous anti-U.S., anti-war action in a bid to impose harsh penalty on him and is kicking up a whirlwind of brutal suppression in the south Korean society under the pretext of this case.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Discloses Environmental Degradation by U.S. Army
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Discloses Environmental Degradation by U.S. Army
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The Green Federation, a south Korean environmental organization, on March 21 opened to the public a survey report on the serious environmental degradation in the U.S. military base in Ryongsan, Seoul.
					 According to the south Korean newspaper Kyunghyang Daily News, the survey results of the ground water in 19 places around the military base last year showed the pollution density by oil far surpassing the tolerance limits in 11 places.
					
					 The efficiency of the purification work can not but be low around the base as there are no removal of the pollution reasons and no disclosure of the process by which pollution takes place in the base, the federation deplored.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Denounce U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Denounce U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations of of south Korea including the People's Action for Peace against War and students' organizations held a rally in Seoul on March 19 to denounce the joint military exercises by the U.S. and its stooges.
					 Speakers at the rally disclosed that Ssangyong drill conducted in Phohang on March 12 was one under an operation plan to "advance into Pyongyang" after landing in the region of the north to "remove the WMDs" and carry out the "beheading operation".
					
					 Saying that the only way of putting the present situation under control is to implement the June 15 joint declaration, they demanded a stop to the joint military maneuvers.

articles.title: Japanese Government Accused of Pressurizing Distortion of History
articles.content:
Japanese Government Accused of Pressurizing Distortion of History
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The Japanese Asahi Shimbun on March 19 disclosed the fact that the Japanese government put pressure on drastically rewriting textbooks for high schools during the screening of textbooks.
					 The Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan was reported to send 206 instructions to rewrite the textbooks applied by a publishing house for screening.
					
					 It forced the publishing house to rewrite that the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army was legally settled while pressurizing it to completely change the description about the Nanjing massacre. 
					
					 An official concerned of a publishing house denounced the Abe regime for pressurizing it to reflect the view of the government on history.
					
					 The Japanese government should bear in mind that truth can never be covered up no matter how desperately it may work to distort history, prompted by a sinister political purpose.

articles.title: Struggle of WPK and Korean People Supported by World Political Parties
articles.content:
Struggle of WPK and Korean People Supported by World Political Parties
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The 20th seminar of the world political parties on building a new society took place in Mexico from March 10 to 12.
					 Adopted at the seminar was a document calling for extending positive support to the struggle of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the Korean people.
					
					 The document said:
					
					 We express full support and solidarity with the WPK and the Korean people in their struggle for defending the country's sovereignty, ensuring peace and reunifying the country independently and peacefully.
					
					 Firstly, we highly appreciate the signal successes being registered by the WPK and the Korean people in building a thriving nation under the uplifted banner of independence, Songun and socialism under the leadership of Comrade Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK.
					
					 Secondly, we support all the proposals and efforts made by the WPK and the DPRK government for reunifying the country in the idea of By Our Nation Itself, preventing the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula and ensuring regional peace and security, and urge the U.S. to roll back its anachronistic hostile policy towards the DPRK and respond to the DPRK's proposals for concluding a peace treaty as early as possible.
					
					 Thirdly, we warmly congratulate the WPK upon its 7th Congress to be held in Pyongyang in May and appeal to the world progressive political parties and organizations to conduct more dynamic international solidarity movement for supporting the just cause of the WPK and the Korean people with the congress as a momentum.
					
					 Among the participants of the seminar were Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico, and other members of the leadership of his party, delegates of its affiliated organizations, delegations and delegates of over 130 political parties and organizations from more than 40 countries including the DPRK, Russia, China and Vietnam, 700 odd in all.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Angola
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Angola
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- An Angolan preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed on March 18.
					 Emanuel Mangueira, director general of the newspaper Eme, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful events praising the revolutionary career of the President and his exploits on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Nigerian Political Party Demands Stop to U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
Nigerian Political Party Demands Stop to U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills 
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The People's Progressive Party of Nigeria expresses full support for the special statement of the DPRK's government, political parties and organizations as regards the on-going mad-cap U.S.-south Korea joint military drills, and once again demands an immediate stop to the war drills for aggression pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to an extreme phase. 
					 The People's Progressive Party of Nigeria was quoted as saying this in its statement on March 17.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 As proved by history, to do harm to the DPRK is an extremely dangerous act of plunging the Korean peninsula, Northeast Asia and other parts of the world into the disaster of a nuclear war. 
					
					 The Korean people regarding their sovereignty and dignity as dearer than their lives will turn out in an all-people sacred war by mobilizing all means if the dignity of the supreme leadership of the country is threatened.
					
					 If the U.S. sincerely wants global peace and security, it should stop at once the dangerous moves provoking others.
					
					 We demand the U.S. immediately accept the most realistic and reasonable proposals made by the DPRK for peace and security on the peninsula.

articles.title: DPRK's Stand Supported by Ethiopian, Nigerian Figures
articles.content:
DPRK's Stand Supported by Ethiopian, Nigerian Figures
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Ethiopian and Nigerian figures extended full support to a special statement issued by the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK.
					 The Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in a statement on March 17 denounced the U.S. and south Korean warmongers for openly revealing the aggressive nature of their joint military exercises.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 We fully support the special statement issued by the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK that it will mercilessly wipe out the worst provocateurs who challenged the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 The provocateurs are sadly mistaken if they think the so-called special operation can work on the DPRK in which all the service personnel and people are closely united around their leader.
					
					 The U.S. should immediately stop its dangerous war drills pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to the point of explosion.
					
					 Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria and chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, said in his statement on March 18:
					
					 I fully support the special statement of the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK that clarified the unshakable will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to deal merciless sledge hammer blows at the provocateurs daring hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 I extend firm solidarity to the Korean people who have turned out as one in the struggle for devotedly defending their leader.

articles.title: U.S. Presidential Candidates Should Learn Lessons from Predecessors: Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
U.S. Presidential Candidates Should Learn Lessons from Predecessors: Nigerian Organization
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on a website an article titled "Lesson from predecessors" on March 16.
					 Noting whoever becomes the U.S. president should learn the lessons from his predecessors, the article cited the Korean war in the 1950s, the case of the U.S. armed spy ship Pueblo, the adoption of the DPRK-U.S. Agreed Framework and the DPRK's declaration of having access to nuclear weapons as examples.
					
					 An article subtitled "Obama compelled DPRK to join advanced nuclear weapons states" said:
					
					 Obama played down the efforts for settling the nuclear issue and ensuring peace on the Korean peninsula, while talking about "strategic patience".
					
					 The DPRK formally informed the U.S. that it would put a moratorium on its nuclear test in case the latter defuses tension by replacing the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty and temporarily suspending its aggressive nuclear war drills but the latter responded to the proposal with continuous war drills against the former.
					
					 The DPRK took a decisive measure for further bolstering up its self-defensive nuclear deterrent.
					
					 That is just the DPRK's first H-bomb test on Jan. 6.
					
					 In the final analysis, Obama, an advocate of the "world without nuclear weapons", compelled the DPRK to join the advanced nuclear weapons states.
					
					 U.S. presidential candidates had better bear in mind the lessons taught by their predecessors that the hostile policy towards the DPRK is bound to go bust.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Highly Praised by Iranian Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Highly Praised by Iranian Newspaper
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Iran News carried a special write-up on March 14 to mark the Day of the Sun, (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.)
					 It was illustrated with a photo of the President standing on Mt. Paektu, a photo of the President and leader Kim Jong Il standing together and the one of Marshal Kim Jong Un inspecting a unit of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The newspaper in an article titled "Peerlessly great man" said that HE Kim Il Sung, the eternal President of the DPRK, was a great man shining long with the 20th century that brought about an unprecedented turn in hewing out the destiny of mankind.
					
					 Noting those having different political views and religious faith and even politicians of the countries hostile to the DPRK admired the personality of the President, it cited former American President Jimmy Carter's and former Japanese Vice-Prime Minister Sin Kanemaru's deep impressions of him as an example.
					
					 It also carried a photo of his birthplace in Mangyongdae.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Observed in Uganda
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Observed in Uganda
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- An Ugandan national preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed at the Presidency on March 18.
					 Henri Masico, department director of the Ugandan Presidency, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to significantly organize political and cultural events to praise the exploits of the President and introduce the struggle of the Korean people for building a thriving nation on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige prueba de expulsion de motor y separacion de cohete
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige prueba de expulsion de motor y separacion de cohete
Pyongyang, 24 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la prueba sobre la tierra de la expulsion de motor con gran potencia de cohete con materia prima solida y la separacion escalonada.
					La presente prueba se realizo con el objeto de evaluar la seguridad de la estructura y la fuerza propulsora del motor, nuevamente disenado y fabricado a nuestro estilo, y las caracteristicas de funcionamiento del sistema de separacion termica y el otro.
					
					Con anterioridad, palpando el motor el Mariscal dijo que saldra exitoso en la prueba porque fue desarrollado y fabricado por nuestros cientificos y tecnicos de la rama de la defensa nacional y es un producto de autoconfianza y autofortalecimiento.
					
					Luego, dio la orden de inicio de la prueba.
					
					Al momento, fue expulsado el gran fuego desde el motor junto con gran ruido ensordecedor que tiembla el cielo y la tierra.
					
					Segun el resultado de la prueba fue confirmado el hecho de que el valor prosupuesto y el de medicion se coinciden increiblemente y se convienen completamente a todos los indices cientificos y tecnicos.
					
					El Mariscal dio aplausos y se mostro una gran satisfaccion felicitando a los participantes y diciendo que es muy excelente y se siente muy alegre.
					
					Estuvo muy contento diciendo que gracias al exito logrado en la prueba de hoy fue preparada la firme garantia para cumplir sin falta las altas metas de ciencias y tecnicas de la defensa nacional planificadas en el presente ano en que se convocara el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, y que podemos elevar mas el poderio de los cohetes balisticas para golpear implacablemente a las fuerzas hostiles.
					
					Al lograr con las propias fuerzas basadas en el espiritu del autofortalecimiento el exito fulminante en la presente prueba que tiene una significacion historica y estrategica podemos elevar extraordinariamente el poderio invencible del ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu, dijo y agrego que se registraran eternamente en los anales de la patria las proezas de los cientificos y tecnicos de la defensa nacional quienes hicieron ingentes esfuerzos por el fortalecimiento del poderio de defensa nacional. Y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Expreso su esperanza y conviccion de que al guardar profundamente el deber importante y honroso asumido ante la epoca y la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo los cientificos y tecnicos de la rama cientifica de defensa nacional lograran uno tras otro los exitos cientificos y tecnicos de defensa nacional que dan la conviccion y el optimismo al ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC, y el temor y pavor a los enemigos.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige Fabrica 11 de Febrero de Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige Fabrica 11 de Febrero de Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong
Pyongyang, 24 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica 11 de Febrero del Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong.
					Recorrio la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria, donde dijo que la sala, donde estan las fotos del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, esta acondicionada cortes y visualmente, y se exhiben bien los datos y objetos historicos.
					
					Subrayo que la historia de desarrollo de la fabrica es precisamente la trayectoria de la direccion del Presidente y el Dirigente y agrego la necesidad de organizar con esmero la educacion con las hazanas de direccion de los grandes Lideres para que los obreros de la fabrica produzcan mucho mas las modernas maquinas pesadas y equipos, que se necesitan imperiosamente en diversas ramas de la economia nacional, para cumplir estrictamente los legados del Presidente y el Dirigente.
					
					El Mariscal hizo conocimiento de la marcha de la labor de desarrollo de nueva maquina, dada por el mismo durante la visita del ano pasado a dicha planta.
					
					Viendo las maquinas ultramodernas, dio la maxima estimacion diciendo que merece que reciba el titulo de heroe la Fabrica 11 de Febrero que cumple sin falta las tareas dadas por el partido.
					
					Recorriendo el taller de paleria, el de acero fundido, el de montaje y otros puntos de la fabrica, reconocio concretamente el estado de produccion.
					
					Destacando que es muy importante el deber de la Fabrica asumida en el desarrollo de la industria de construccion de maquinaria del pais y la construccion de la patria prospera, presento las tareas que se presentan en la produccion y gestion.
					
					Se refirio a que para aumentar mas que ahora la capacidad de la produccion de la fabrica y mejorar mas la calidad de los productos, hay que modernizar la fabrica conforme a la demanda de la epoca de economia basada en la intelectualidad y a la fisonomia de un estado civilizado socialista, y dio las preciosas instrucciones para el particular.
					
					Ya que el aumento de la produccion y el mejoramiento de la calidad de los productos estan asegurados por las ciencias y tecnicas, debe acondicionar bien la base de divulgacion de las ciencias y tecnicas y gestionarla bien para que los funcionarios y los empleados de la fabrica se armen con firmeza con las ciencias y tecnicas modernas y debe prestar gran atencion a la labor para hacerles de intelectuales al agruparlos en el sistema de estudio trabajando.
					
					Anadio que el partido asumira la construccion de la sala de divulgacion de ciencias y tecnicas, la casa cultural, etc. dentro del ano en curso.
					
					Expreso su gran esperanza y conviccion de que los obreros de la fabrica renovaran la fabrica conforme a la demanda de la epoca de la epoca de economia basada en intelectualidad y a la fisonomia del estado civilizado socialista y registraran un nuevo auge en el desarrollo de nuevas maquinas modernas y en la produccion.
					
					Le acompano el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Hong Yong Chil.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias a rey de Belgica
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias a rey de Belgica
Pyongyang, 24 de marzo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 23 un mensaje de condolencias al rey de Belica, Philippe, en relacion con que hubo una gran perdida humana debido al ataque terrorista ocurrido en Brucelas.
					El remitente expresa profunda simpatia y condolencias al destinatario, y por su conducto, a las victimas y sus familiares.
					
					Reafirmando la invariable posicion del gobierno de la RPDC contra el terror de toda indole, desea que Belica eliminara cuanto antes las consecuencias tragicas y recobrara la tranquilidad.

articles.title: CJC denuncia sancion anti-RPDC de fuerzas hostiles
articles.content:
CJC denuncia sancion anti-RPDC de fuerzas hostiles
Pyongyang, 24 de marzo (ACNC) -- Despues de aprobada la "resolucion de sancion" anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea no. 2270 del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, los Estados Unidos y sus satelites intensifican la campana anti-RPDC tomando a porfia las unilaterales medidas de sancion.
					Al respecto, el portavoz del Comite de Juristas de Corea hizo publica el dia 24 una declaracion. 
					
					La nota senala que la prueba de bomba de hidrogeno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea es una medida de autodefensa para defender la soberania y el derecho a la subsistencia nacional desde la politica de hostilidad y la creciente amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. 
					
					Desde el punto de vista de la ley internacional, todo esto no puede ser en ningun caso un objeto de la "resolucion de sancion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, ratifica la nota y continua:
					
					El derecho a la autodefensa de un Estado soberano es justo en virtud de la ley internacional. 
					
					Este tema esta estipulado en la "convencion sobre la responsabilidad estatal". Y ateniendose al principio de la ley internacional, desde el XX periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU, efectuado en 1965, ha venido aprobandose como resolucion la "declaracion sobre la intolerable intervencion en los asuntos internos estatales y la defensa de la independencia y la soberania". 
					
					El fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC no tiene restriccion por haber declarado la retirada del Tratado de No Proliferacion en marzo de 1993 frente a la grave situacion creada en aquel entonces por la amenaza de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. y haberlo puesto en vigencia en enero de 2003. 
					
					El lanzamiento de satelite de la RPDC tampoco puede ser problematico, porque es el ejercicio del derecho al desarrollo de cosmos, atribuido por la ley internacional. 
					
					Sin embargo, EE.UU. fabrico la "resolucion de sancion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU cuestionando el derecho legitimo de la RPDC incluso el de autodefensa de un Estado soberano, lo cual deviene brutal violacion de la soberania de la RPDC, grave amenaza a la paz y seguridad del mundo y climax del despotismo. 
					
					Insatisfecho con la fabricacion de la ilicita "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC, instigo a las fuerzas seguidoras a ejercer las sanciones independientes incluso la sancion sobre las empresas extranjeras relacionadas con la RPDC, insistiendo en la necesidad de llenar el vacio. 
					
					La campana de sancion y aplastamiento unilaterales de EE.UU. resulta un crimen antietico que persigue el derrocamiento de regimen de un Estado soberano e infringe los derechos al desarrollo y subsistencia de otros paises. 
					
					Son mil veces justas las contramedidas superintransigentes de la RPDC tanto en virtud de la ley internacional como desde el punto de vista del derecho a la autodefensa, ya que se ha evidenciado que la brutal campana de sancion y aplastamiento de las fuerzas hostiles persigue la privacion del derecho a la subsistencia de la nacion coreana y el derrocamiento del regimen socialista de la RPDC.
					
					Cuanto mas EE.UU. y sus satelites intensifiquen la sancion anti-RPDC, tanto mas se hara fuerte la capacidad de autofortalecimiento de la RPDC y se adelantara el fin tragico de ellos mismos.

articles.title: FGEAC acoge 70o aniversario de su fundacion
articles.content:
FGEAC acoge 70o aniversario de su fundacion
Pyongyang, 24 de marzo (ACNC) -- La Federacion General de Escritores y Artistas de Corea (FGEAC) acoge el 70o aniversario de su fundacion. 
					Durante 70 anos que data de su fundacion el 25 de marzo del 35 (1946) de la Era Juche, la FGEAC ha alcanzado muchos exitos en formar a los funcionarios, creadores y artistas como revolucionarios infinitamente fieles al partido y al lider y llamarlos a la materializacion de la autoctona orientacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en materia de la literatura y arte.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 24 en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang el acto por el 70o aniversario de la fundacion de la FGEAC con la participacion del secretario del Comite Central del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, el ministro de Cultura Pak Chun Nam, los funcionarios, creadores, artistas, profesores e investigadores de la rama.
					
					En la ocasion fue transmitido un mensaje de felicitacion del Comite Central del PTC enviado a las organizaciones, funcionarios y miembros de la FGEAC.

articles.title: Tiene lugar reunion anual de CNCDP
articles.content:
Tiene lugar reunion anual de CNCDP
Pyongyang, 24 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 24 en la Casa Cultural Chollima la reunion anual del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz, con motivo del 67o aniversario de su fundacion. 
					Asistieron los funcionarios directivos del CNCDP, los miembros del Comite Permanente y los funcionarios y miembros del Secretariado de la misma entidad. 
					
					Y estuvieron presentes en calidad de observadores los funcionarios del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con los Pueblos del Mundo, el Comite Coreano de Solidaridad de los Pueblos Afro-Asiaticos, la Asociacion de Juristas Democraticos de Corea y otras entidades sociales del pais. 
					
					El informante hizo balance de los exitos y experiencias alcanzados en el trabajo del CNCDP en el ano pasado. 
					
					Al informar sobre la situacion politica regional e internacional de 2015 en torno a la Peninsula Coreana, dijo que la politica de hostilidad contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de EE.UU. y sus satelites pone graves obstaculos en la lucha por la paz y la reunificacion del pais. 
					
					Ratifico que en la situacion actual en que la Peninsula Coreana se encuentra en el inminente peligro de guerra nuclear, el CNCDP debe dinamizar este ano tambien las actividades pacifistas de diferentes formas que contribuyan a la paz y la reunificacion del pais, de acuerdo con su mision y el objetivo de sus actividades.
					
					Los oradores se refirieron al problema de fomentar los lazos con las personalidades progresistas del mundo y las entidades democraticas y de paz y solidaridad internacionales para que ellas se esfuercen por la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico y el mundo y por la prosperidad comun de la humanidad. 
					
					Terminada la reunion, los participantes vieron las fotos alusivas a las actividades del CNCDP del ano pasado.
